<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 1PT;">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 1PT;">
	Ladies and Gentlemen:
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT;">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.85PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF;">
	We hereby issue this Irrevocable Standby Letter of Credit No.&#160;
<U>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL;">
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL;">
	(&#8220;
</FONT>
	Letter of Credit&#8221;) in your favor for the account of Xplore Technologies Corporation of America, a Delaware corporation (&#8220;Tenant&#8221;) for a sum not to exceed an aggregate amount of $
<U>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL;">
	effective
</FONT>
	immediately and expiring at our office at&#160;
<U>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF;">
	on&#160;&#160;
<U>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF;">
	(&#8220;Expiry Date&#8221;).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF;">
	Notwithstanding anything herein to the
</FONT>
	contrary, this Letter of Credit shall automatically renew on a year-to-year basis, the first such renewal commencing on the day immediately following the Expiry Date unless we notify you (Beneficiary) in writing at least thirty (30) days prior to the Expiry Date (or the applicable subsequent Expiry Date, following any such renewal) that we will not renew this Letter of Credit. Partial Drawings are permitted hereunder, and each drawing under this Letter of Credit shall permanently reduce the face amount of this Letter of Credit by the amount of such drawing.
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.75PT;">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.85PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT;">
	The face amount of this Letter of Credit may be reduced upon delivery to us at our offices indicated above of a completed request for reduction in the form of Annex A (as stated below) (&#8220;Reduction Certificate&#8221;) executed by your authorized officer and an authorized signatory on behalf of Tenant.&#160; The amount of any such reduction shall be the amount indicated in the Reduction Certificate.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT;">
	We undertake that drawings under this Letter of Credit will be duly honored upon presentation to us at our office indicated above on any Business Day (as defined below) on or before the Expiry Date of your sight draft(s) drawn on us, bearing the clause: &#8220;Drawn under&#160;&#160;
<U>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL;">
	&#160; Irrevocable
</FONT>
	Standby Letter of Credit No.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF;">
<U>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
	&#8221;, together with a statement in the form of Annex B (as stated below) purportedly executed by your authorized officer and regardless of whether Tenant disputes the content of such statement. Payment will be made hereunder not later than 1:00 p.m. Central time on the third Business Day (as defined below) following the date such demand for payment is presented as aforesaid. Payment of any amount drawn under this Letter of Credit will be made in immediately available funds by wire transfer to such account as you shall specify or in such other manner as you specify in the sight draft presented to us with respect to such payment. For purposes of this Letter of Credit, the term &#8220;Business Day&#8221; shall mean a day upon which banks in Illinois are open for commercial business.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 41PT;">
	This Letter of Credit is transferable in full and not in part.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT;">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT;">
	This Letter of Credit sets forth in full the terms of our undertaking and such undertaking shall not in any way be modified, amended or amplified by reference to any document or instrument referred to herein or in which this Letter of Credit is referred to or to which this Letter of Credit relates and any such reference shall not be deemed to incorporate herein by reference to any document or instrument.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT;">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT;">
	Except as stated herein, this undertaking is not subject to any condition or qualification. Our obligations under this Letter of Credit shall be the individual obligation of&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-VARIANT: NORMAL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL;">

</U>
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;Bank, in no way contingent upon reimbursement with respect thereto.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT;">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 6.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT;">
	Except insofar as expressly stated herein, this Standby Letter of Credit undertaking is subject to the International Standby Practices 1998, International Chamber of Commerce Publication No. 590.

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="Z9B24AC5D81804BFFAB727A97BDE56B3F" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%;">

</TD>

<A NAME="FIS_EXPERTS_CONSENT"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<U>
	Consent of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	We hereby consent to the incorporation by reference in the previously filed Registration Statement on Form&#160;S-8 (File No. 333-161890), the previously filed Registration Statement on Form S-8 (File No. 333-164741), and the previously filed Registration Statement on Form S-3 (File No. 333-187198) of Xplore Technologies Corp. of our report dated June 29, 2016, relating to&#160;the consolidated financial statements of Xplore Technologies Corp. and subsidiary for the two year period ended March&#160;31, 2016, which report appears in this Annual Report on Form&#160;10-K of Xplore Technologies Corp.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

<DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV>
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&#160;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&#160;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<TABLE ID="Z85311F773E6E4EB8B677AE6A649C9A92" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV>
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">

<DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<TABLE ID="ZE6E5D2A5E320427A81C4BC3C1CA54811" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV>
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<TABLE ID="ZAE084B6DD1824E7084B21CDF0E5488FD" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV>
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrants&#8217; fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<TABLE ID="ZC16DD98690EB4696B5FF458C9F8ADB81" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV>
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<TABLE ID="ZAD440E4C2C74481688A70F2DBB8F9A84" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV>
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<TABLE ID="Z74A38BD25AF74F199A6C06BD7DF2A87B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

</DIV>

	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	In connection with the Annual Report on Form&#160;10-K of Xplore Technologies Corp. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) for the fiscal year ended March&#160;31, 2016 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#8220;Report&#8221;), Philip S. Sassower, as Chief Executive Office of the Company, and Tom Wilkinson, as Chief Financial Officer of the Company, each hereby certifies, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167;1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167;906 of the Sarbanes&#8209;Oxley Act of 2002, that, to the best of each such officer&#8217;s knowledge:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">

	&#160;
